member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush1.GetInterpolationMode1
member.summary: Returns the current interpolation mode of the brush.

member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush1.SetInterpolationMode1
member.summary: Sets the interpolation mode for the brush.

returns.div: Note If interpolationMode is not a valid member of D2D1_INTERPOLATION_MODE, then this method silently ignores the call.

member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush1
member.summary: Paints an area with a bitmap.
